mapper.select: SELECT Q_NO, Q_TITLE, Q_SOS, Q_UP, Q_RPT_CNT, Q_DATE, MEM_NICK FROM MEM M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN Q Q1 ON M1.MEM_NO = Q1.MEM_NO
